Auckland bus attack: Man to face court following assault on bus driver https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bus-attack-man-to-face-court-following-assault-on-bus-driver/EJ3QC4WJ55AN5GRYY3XHRZM7GU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bus-attack-man-to-face-court-following-assault-on-bus-driver/EJ3QC4WJ55AN5GRYY3XHRZM7GU/ A 36-year-old West Harbour man has been charged with assault. Sun, 08 Sep 2024 21:37:45 +0000 Raj Trehan has been driving buses in Auckland for five years and has seen his share of unruly passengers. But until now he'd never been attacked.
